userId.description: Government Gateway ID for the generated user

password.description: Government Gateway password for the generated user

saUtr.description: Enrols a user for Self Assessment and generates a SA UTR

nino.description: Enrols a user for National Insurance and generates a National Insurance Number

mtdItId.description: Enrols a user for Making Tax Digital Income Tax and generates a MTD IT ID

empRef.description: Enrols a user for PAYE for Employers and generates an Employer Reference

ctUtr.description: Enrols a user for Corporation Tax and generates a CT UTR

vrn.description: Enrols a user for a VAT Online Account and generates a VAT Reference Number
